scene.text: ZZZzzz...
ZZzz...arf...grunt! Who's there?!
Ah...it’s you.
Hey! I’m Chaplin.
I guess you haven't got yourself a Habbo, yet.
A Habbo like me, I mean :)
Ok, follow me.
Welcome to Habbo Hotel, Sir! Enjoy your stay.
Oh thanks! I always do.
Hi, DJ_Shadow! You’re the first.
What up, Chap? I got your message… so here I am!
Yo! Welcome to the Habbo Hotel!
Ready to help, Chaplin!
Neat! So, who wants to go first?
Me! I'm going diving!
Mm... I've got my usual messy room :)
I'm gonna DJ at a party.
Howwww!! Arf arf...
Hello Ralph, you sweet thing.
Welcome to my room. I fixed it MY way :)
It’s... almost tidy :)
Refreshments! Cola, Habbo style!
Help yourself, Chap. It’s almost fresh & totally free.
Hey, where did you hide your hi-tech gizmo?
Mm... Let’s see what’s in my Hand.
Here you go. Habbo Rollers aplenty!
Cool :)
I won them in a tough race :)
Let's roll with the new Smiling Headbangerz’ single.
Woof?
Roll & Rock!
Joycore!
C’mon Ralph! Join us!
Woof?
Lame, dog.
*Dizzy*
Woah! looks like I've got a weak stomach. All that cola maybe.
You’re such a strange boy Chap’:)
I've gotta go, Chap- have to find something to wear for the party later.
Hi there! Hope you liked my hangout.
I hope I can see yours sometime!
Bye!
Thanks Cherry-Bomb! :)
Now, wanna check in and create your Habbo?
Just click on the teleport.
Or you can continue the guided tour.
Yo! DJ_Shadow, your place is packed out!
As usual! Now get ready...
'Cause party-time is NOW!
Dude! Your room rocks!
WOOT! This is the place to be, yo.
Habbos, cheer Chaplin and his friend!
Cheers!
Cheers everyone!
Actually, I prefer Christmas trees to techno :)
:O
Argh! Chap, DON'T play with my stereo!
Instead we shall sling the rhymes to see who gets the dimes.
It's a dance off. Oh yes.
I'm the synthetic MC, a virtual DJ, the decks that you see are my muse
The music lights my fuse and tightens the noose; in this game I cannot lose
With this virtual lyre, I fuel the fire, making the party go even higher
Dancing for furni, get the gurney, gonna be in for a long journey
Baby, you dance like a vision, causing a schism, for you I ain't got no derision
In this duel, if you don't rule, all you get is ridicule
Uh.. This party is so cool... It um... makes me drool?
But alas, as you raise your hands to the sky, we have to say goodbye!
Wanna beam in? Just click the teleport.
Or you can continue the guided tour.
HABBOOOOOM!
Scary! I'd never have the guts to freefall 30 feet.
Oh c'mon, it's the thrill of the dive!
I LOVE it :)
I’m more of a synchronised swimmer…
A rare moment of glory...
This takes skill.
So... let’s gooooo...
Splash-tastic!
Awesome!
Why, thank you.
What did you think, Chap?
Simply breathtaking :)
Cool! Starting to get bored already….
Guys! Wanna have a fashion show?
Yes, yes I do.
I was born for modelling!
Ok, let's all meet in my room then!
I need to find something to wear!
Bling bling!
Wow, the place emptied pretty fast!
Habbos can be SO restless.
Argh, what happened? I was at the loo...
Waaaaiiit... I wanna party, too!
Habbos can also be VERY odd.
Now, dive in to Habbo Hotel?
Just click on the duck.
Or you can continue the guided tour.
You've had taste of Habbo Hotel now...
...but the REAL thing is waiting inside!!
It's a simple process.
Just click the log in button...
...create your own Habbo...
...use the Navigator to move around and build rooms...
...and the Console to connect with new friends.
All the rest is for you to discover!
What about me?
Well, after this tour I need rest...
...and dreams :)
I'll see you later in Habbo Hotel.
Join uszzzzzz...
Or follow me to The End.
